Day 3 of Our Alaskan Cruise- Obie and Johnnie on a Whale Quest

Heading out of Juneau for a whale quest
Seas a bit rough and rain in sight
Oops- rain on the boat cabin window- not good!

Look in center of screen for wisping like smoke- that's a humpback whale blowing air!
To left of flash, white spot near shore is a orca whale
Whale entering to left in center of ring- gosh they are fast!

We saw six whales- not firing new camera quick enough! Obie wishing at this point she had her Canon Rebel film camera!
A bit better- see his/her blow and back
Gotcha!
